name: Actors With The Same Name Online Trivia | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which movie starred Polly Bergen, rather than Candice Bergen?
questions.explanation:
Cape Fear.

	Polly played Gregory Peck's wife in the thriller that also starred Robert Mitchum. "Group" and "Sand" were early movies for the young Candice. "Oliver" was the sequel to "Love Story".

questions.text: Inger Stevens used her beauty as a vehicle to an acting career. Which movie did NOT include her in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Poseidon Adventure.

	"Poseidon" had Stella Stevens, not Inger (or even Connie) in the cast."Madigan" was a cop movie, "Guide" was a comedy and "Buccaneer" was an adventure.

questions.text: Which movie included Shirley Jones in the cast, rather than Carolyn?
questions.explanation:
Elmer Gantry.

	A big role for Shirley, who played against type. Carolyn had small roles in "Marjorie" and "Trap".

questions.text: Which movie starred Rod Taylor, rather than Robert Taylor?
questions.explanation:
Sunday in New York.

	Rod starred in "Sunday" with Jane Fonda.

questions.text: Which movie starred Katharine Hepburn, rather than Audrey?
questions.explanation:
Sea of Grass.

	"Sea" was a Tracy/Hepburn movie. Young Audrey starred in "Hour" and "Nun". "Robin" came later (with Sean Connery).

questions.text: Which movie starred Mary Tyler Moore, rather than Demi Moore?
questions.explanation:
Six Weeks.

	"Six" came right after Mary's big dramatic success in "Ordinary People".

questions.text: Which movie starred Sarah Miles, rather than Vera Miles?
questions.explanation:
Ryan's Daughter.

	"Ryan" was a long, somewhat dull David Lean movie.

questions.text: Which movie starred Kirk Douglas, rather than son Michael?
questions.explanation:
The Vikings.

	It was an action movie for Kirk. "Roses" was a comedy, "Rain" was a cop movie and "Line" was a musical.

questions.text: Which movie starred Dick Powell, rather than William Powell?
questions.explanation:
Murder, My Sweet.

	A big movie for Dick, who had played very different roles before being a tough gumshoe in this movie. "Godfrey" and "Father" werewell-known movies. William played the doctor in "Roberts".

questions.text: Which movie starred Gail Russell, rather than Jane Russell?
questions.explanation:
The Angel and the Badman.

	Gail did a nice job in this John Wayne western - before her drinking shortened her life and her career.
